title: Shiro no Koukoku Monogatari - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Artifacts   Beastkin   Dragons   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Politics   Polygamy   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sword And Magic   Wars
author: 白沢戌亥
description: Having lost his money, lover, and future, a man who has given up on everything finds himself reincarnated in the kingdom of Altodestenia. He, Lectival, has no memories prior to being saved by Meriela, the daughter of an aristocrat, and now finds himself rising up to save the kingdom in its current crisis.>
